input.sentences: while on a hike i encountered a tree with a red paper like bark .
it was much complimented by the green leaves of the plants around it .
close by blue berries were ready to be picked .
while a butterfly sipped nectar without a care in the world .
and a millipede crawled on the moist ground looking for its next prey .
output.sentences: The tree bark was peeling back to reveal it's new growth.
It's leaves stretched out to soak up the sunlight.
And the berries produced were sweet and juicy.
Insects came to feast on the food supply it produced.
But some consumed and ate of the decaying debris that fell from the tree.
